$Game called on account of rain; as they entered the eighth, the skies were dark and rain was imminent; the following events are from the top of the eighth:  Youngs doubled; Frisch RBI single and he advanced to 2B on an error by Brown; Wilson stuck out; with Kelly at bat the rain came down hard; HR Umpire Klem could not see the players and he was getting drenched, so he called the game; the score reverted to previous inning1924BRO.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
